hanzi-su-wiki:
軍

Значения

Армия, войско; военный

Мнемоника

Искажено. Вверху — человек 人, начальник войска, имеющего и боевые колесницы 車.

Варианты

军

jp_example_words:
軍(いくさ): war, battle, campaign, fight
軍艦(ぐんかん): warship, battleship
軍事(ぐんじ): military affairs
軍備(ぐんび): armaments, military preparations
軍服(ぐんぷく): military or naval uniform
軍(ぐん): army, force, troops
軍隊(ぐんたい): army, troops
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You run into someone's forehead with your car. The big forehead you hit is Kim Jong Un's. You know that now you're going to have the whole North Korean army coming after you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself running away from the North Korean army. You have to get to the border, the entire army is coming after you for hitting their dear leader!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The army is after you. Each army soldier has a gun (ぐん) and they want to use these guns of theirs to shoot you dead! You killed their leader with a car and now they’re gonna get you back with a gun!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture yourself running away from them as they shout and shoot at you. Hear the bullets wizzing past your head as you run away as fast as you can.
Ru_trainchinese: jūn: (графема) вооруженные силы; армия, корпус
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a covered (冖) car (車) is used by the army
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: British army cars are at the service of the crown
humanum_full_description_en:
Jinwen means the army, Zhongshan Wangding: "Lead the three armies to conquer unsuitable (righteous) states."

"Zhou Li. Land official. "Situ": "The five brigade is the division, and the fifth division is the army." Zheng Xuan's note: "The army is 2,500 people."

"Said the text": "The army, the surrounding area. Four thousand people are the army. From the car, from the province. The army, the army."
humanum_short_description_en: " Army " Inscriptions from the beginning, " Bao " from " car ", Zhongshan Wang Ding from the " car ", " uniform " sound, Ge nine generals from the " car " from the " Yin ."
humanum_full_description:
金文表示軍隊，中山王鼎：「親率三軍之眾，以征不宜(義)之邦」。

　　《周禮．地官．司徒》：「五旅為師，五師為軍。」鄭玄注：「軍萬二千五百人。」

　　《說文》：「軍，圜圍也。四千人爲軍。从車，从包省。軍，兵車也。」
humanum_short_description: 「軍」金文初從「勹」從「車」，中山王鼎從「車」，「勻」聲，九年將軍戈則從「車」從「螾」。

Jinwen means the army, Zhongshan Wangding: "Lead the three armies to conquer unsuitable (righteous) states." "Zhou Li. Land official. "Situ": "The five brigade is the division, and the fifth division is the army." Zheng Xuan's note: "The army is 2,500 people." "Said the text": "The army, the surrounding area. Four thousand people are the army. From the car, from the province. The army, the army."

軍字的基本解释

軍
jūn
见“军”。

軍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jūn］
［《廣韻》舉云切，平文，見。］
“军1”的繁体字。
(1)军队。
(2)军队的编制单位。
(3)在现代为军队编制的一级。由数个师和若干战斗、保障部（分）队组成。
(4)指兵种。
(5)军营，营垒。
(6)驻屯。
(7)包围；攻围。
(8)攻击；攻灭。
(9)指挥军队。
(10)兵卒，徒众。
(11)从军。
(12)唐代设兵戍守之地的军事机构。
(13)宋代行政区域名。宋置全国为十八路，下设州、府、军、监三百二十二。
(14)刑法的一种。一般指充军。
(15)用同“君”。

軍字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軍； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1239第11
〔古文〕?【廣韻】舉云切【集韻】【韻會】拘云切，?音君。【玉篇】衆也。【周禮·地官】五師爲軍。【註】萬二千五百人。周制：天子六軍。諸侯大國三軍，次國二軍，小國一軍。　又軍禮。【周禮·春官】大宗伯以軍禮平邦國。【註】謂威其不協僭差者。　又師所駐曰軍。【左傳·桓六年】軍於瑕以待之。【戰國策】軍于邯鄲之郊。【註】屯也。　又姓。冠軍侯之後，因氏。　又【說文】軍，圜圉也。一曰軍，兵車也。

軍字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
軍字的起名意思

暂无。

military
Basic explanation of words
military
jūn
See "Army".
military
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jūn］
["Guang Yun" cite the cloud cut, plain text, see. ]
Traditional characters for "军1".
(1) Army.
(2) The organization of the army.
(3) The level of establishment for the army in modern times. It is composed of several divisions and several combat and support departments (divisions).
(4) Refers to arms.
(5) Barracks, barracks.
(6) Stationed in the village.
(7) Encirclement; siege.
(8) Attack; attack and destroy.
(9) Command the army.
(10) Soldiers, disciples.
(11) Join the army.
(12) The military institutions that set up garrisons in the Tang Dynasty.
(13) The name of the administrative area in Song Dynasty. In Song Dynasty, the whole country was eighteen roads, with three hundred and twenty-two states, government, army, and prison.
(14) A type of criminal law. Generally refers to the army.
(15) Use the same as "jun".
military
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Che Zi Department] 　 Jun; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: Page 1239 No. 11
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] Ju Yunqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ju Yunqi,? Yin Jun. [Jade articles] All too. 【Zhou Li·Guanguan】The fifth division is the army. [Note] Two thousand five hundred people. Weekly system: The Sixth Army of the Emperors. The princes have the three armies of the big country, the second country has the second army, and the small country has the first army.　 Another military salute. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] Da Zongbo relied on the army to pacify the country. [Note] The arrogant person who pretends to be disagreeable.　The army stationed in Japan. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Sixth Year] The army is ready for flaws. [Warring States Policy] The army is on the outskirts of Handan. [Note] Tun also.　Another last name. After the champion Hou, Yin's.　[Said the text] Army, 圜圉 also. One is the army, and also the soldiers.

Name meaning

jūn
вм. 军
Radicals: 冖, 車  (forehead, car)
Meaning Mnemonic
You run into someone's forehead with your car. The big forehead you hit is Kim Jong Un's. You know that now you're going to have the whole North Korean army coming after you.
Imagine yourself running away from the North Korean army. You have to get to the border, the entire army is coming after you for hitting their dear leader!
Reading Mnemonic
The army is after you. Each army soldier has a gun (ぐん) and they want to use these guns of theirs to shoot you dead! You killed their leader with a car and now they’re gonna get you back with a gun!
Picture yourself running away from them as they shout and shoot at you. Hear the bullets wizzing past your head as you run away as fast as you can.
